title: coding-snippet

1 + 1

[1] 2



PlotData



print("hello world")

[1] "hello world"





1+1

[1] 2

title: Choices
text:
Choices enable you to run different code based on conditions / input. The most basic form of choices is the if statement.

PythonRSQL



z = 4
if z % 2 == 0:  # True
    print("z is even")

z is even




in one line

z = 4
if (z %% 2 == 0) print("z is even")

[1] "z is even"


in several lines

z = 5
if (z %% 2 != 0) {
  print("z is not even")
}

[1] "z is not even"





SELECT
  name
  , age
  , if age > 65 THEN 'oldie, but goldie' else 'adult or underaged' endif as 'Age Group'
from persons;
